Directions respecting the plates. 
The figures 2, 3, 4, 5, 18 & 19 are all supposed to be 
highly magnified. all the other spectra are nearly 
of the natural size. But the dimensions of 
any of the figures may be changed, provided 
the same proportions are observed & all the 
parts expressed. 
A mistake was made in drawing the coloured 
figure No 4. which was not observed untill too 
late to be corrected. the middle of the dividing 
ring, expressed by part of a dotted circle, should have 
passed through the points 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, &c. marked 
with Ink. to supply this mistake, the circles of 
the unshaded figure also marked as, may be 
substituted instead of those of the coloured one; 
the letters & figures of reference will then agree 
with the manuscript. 
It is scarcely necessary to say that 
the rectilinear, circular or Elliptical  figures, 
will be much easiest & best executed by a Machine 
& all the rest by Hand.
